--- select_literals_array.sql
SELECT
  [1, 2, 3],
  ['x', 'y', 'xy'],
  ARRAY[1, 2, 3],
  ARRAY<string>['x', 'y', 'xy'],
  ARRAY<int64>[]

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.ArrayLiteral{
          pos:    9,
          end:    18,
          Type:   nil,
          Values: []parser.Expr{
            &parser.IntLiteral{
              pos:   10,
              end:   11,
              Value: "1",
            },
            &parser.IntLiteral{
              pos:   13,
              end:   14,
              Value: "2",
            },
            &parser.IntLiteral{
              pos:   16,
              end:   17,
              Value: "3",
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.ArrayLiteral{
          pos:    22,
          end:    38,
          Type:   nil,
          Values: []parser.Expr{
            &parser.StringLiteral{
              pos:   23,
              end:   26,
              Value: "x",
            },
            &parser.StringLiteral{
              pos:   28,
              end:   31,
              Value: "y",
            },
            &parser.StringLiteral{
              pos:   33,
              end:   37,
              Value: "xy",
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.ArrayLiteral{
          pos:    42,
          end:    56,
          Type:   nil,
          Values: []parser.Expr{
            &parser.IntLiteral{
              pos:   48,
              end:   49,
              Value: "1",
            },
            &parser.IntLiteral{
              pos:   51,
              end:   52,
              Value: "2",
            },
            &parser.IntLiteral{
              pos:   54,
              end:   55,
              Value: "3",
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.ArrayLiteral{
          pos:  60,
          end:  89,
          Type: &parser.SimpleType{
            pos:  66,
            Name: "STRING",
          },
          Values: []parser.Expr{
            &parser.StringLiteral{
              pos:   74,
              end:   77,
              Value: "x",
            },
            &parser.StringLiteral{
              pos:   79,
              end:   82,
              Value: "y",
            },
            &parser.StringLiteral{
              pos:   84,
              end:   88,
              Value: "xy",
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.ArrayLiteral{
          pos:  93,
          end:  107,
          Type: &parser.SimpleType{
            pos:  99,
            Name: "INT64",
          },
          Values: []parser.Expr{},
        },
      },
    },
    From:    (*parser.From)(nil),
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT ARRAY[1, 2, 3], ARRAY["x", "y", "xy"], ARRAY[1, 2, 3], ARRAY<STRING>["x", "y", "xy"], ARRAY<INT64>[]
